Grouped_Utterances: I think I’d like to talk more about managing my emotions. I still feel overwhelmed sometimes.

Hey! I’ve been doing okay. I actually tried writing down some ideas like we talked about. It felt really freeing. I just wrote whatever came to mind without worrying about it being perfect. Yeah, I came up with a couple of funny sketches. One is about a guy who can’t stop getting stuck in awkward situations. I was thinking of maybe writing a script for it. Just to see how it flows. I’m a little nervous about that. What if they don’t find it funny? I think it’s mostly stress from school and my relationships. Sometimes it just feels like too much.
We’ve been checking in more regularly, and it’s been nice. We’re still working on rebuilding that trust. I feel hopeful. I’m learning to be more open and honest, which is nice.

It’s been a bit better! I started watching lighter shows before bed, and it seems to help. Yeah, I’ve had fewer nightmares, which is a relief. I still have some vivid dreams, but they’re not as scary. I’ve been trying to stick to a bedtime routine, like reading a book before bed instead of jumping straight into a show. I think it helps. I feel more relaxed when I do it.
I’ve been trying to take breaks and step back when I need to, but it doesn’t always work.
Perfect! We can also explore some mindfulness techniques in our next session, which may help you manage those overwhelming feelings in the moment.
I’ll work on my sleep routine, continue writing my sketches, and create that list of activities for stress relief.
